DOC.brief_summary: This field trial Unicirc instrument excise foreskin , plus use cyanoacrylate tissue adhesive seal wound .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 4 Field Trial Unicirc Instrument With Tissue Adhesive
DOC.criteria: Men least 18 year age Poor general health Anatomical abnormality would complicate circumcision Bleeding disorder Ongoing infection Can attend followup visit
